item.title: Resume
item.description: Contact Christopher Negrich Github:   cnegrich LinkedIn: Christopher Negrich Email:    cnegrich@gmail.com Summary Graduate of Barrett Honors College at Arizona State University with a degree in mathematics and experience designing geometric, security and data science tools utilizing Python, C, Rust, and other programming languages. Skilled in software and algorithm development, the software development lifecycle, security protocol management, and IT solutions. Education Honors Bachelors of Science in Mathematics awarded May 2018 Barrett Honors College at Arizona State University, Tempe, Arizona
